channel.title: CVE Feed for Red Hat -- RHPAM 7.13.1 async
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Red Hat -- RHPAM 7.13.1 async

item.title: CVE-2022-1415|2024-09-25T19:54:35.795Z -- red%20hat -- rhpam%207.13.1%20async
item.description: A flaw was found where some utility classes in Drools core did not use proper safeguards when deserializing data. This flaw allows an authenticated attacker to construct malicious serialized objects (usually called gadgets) and achieve code execution on the server.
